diff_hunk:
@@ -18,6 +18,16 @@
 from __future__ import division
 from __future__ import print_function
 
-# pylint: disable=unused-import,wildcard-import
-from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python import *
-# pylint: enable=unused-import,wildcard-import
+# pylint: disable=unused-import,wildcard-import,g-import-not-at-top
+try:
+  from tensorflow.contrib.tensorrt.python import *
+except Exception as e:
body:
I notice that it throws 
```
NotFoundError: libnvinfer.so.4: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
``` 

I could catch ```Exception``` and throw an ```ImportError``` with the original text attached after our warning. so that any error happens our message gets printed.

```
ImportError: **** Failed to initialize TensorRT. This is either because the TensorRT installation path is not in LD_LIBRARY_PATH, or because you do not have it installed. If not installed, please go to https://developer.nvidia.com/tensorrt to download and install TensorRT ****
libnvinfer.so.4: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
